level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary repeal of section, see § 2(f) of the Legal Service Establishment Emergency Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-620, January 22, 1999, 46 DCR 1343).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-260, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-604.04.
